PhotonOccluder Class Reference

This class defines the interface to all photon occluders, meaning those classes that can return yes or no : I am in the way of the light source. More...

Detailed Description

This class defines the interface to all photon occluders, meaning those classes that can return yes or no : I am in the way of the light source.
